scripts.init: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../findme && npm install
scripts.start-client-prod: cd findme && set PORT=80 && serve -s build
scripts.start-prod-using-serve: npm run init && npm run build-client && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start-api" "npm run start-client-prod"
scripts.start-prod-nginx: npm run init && npm run build-client && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start-api"
